name: Instagram Content Creator Blueprint
description: Everything you need to know to build your Personal Brand, create quality content and grow your audience on Instagram in 2024.This 10 step Notion Guide is packed with all the information and resources on:Covering the Essentials What is a Personal Brand and why you should start it in 2024 Setting up your ProfileHow to write an effective BIO, optimise your settings and choose a good profile pictureYour Content Creation StrategyDefining your niche, branding, understanding your audience, content gene
